item.kubejs.corporea_crystal.desc:
A strange Crystal capable of exchanging information with others of its kind.
The core of important Corporea devices.
item.mce2.blade_of_eternal_torment.desc: Forged in the depths of the Nether. Used to torment and torture enemies of The Eternal Legion.
item.mce2.quest_loot.desc.3: "An assortment of miscellaneous items of varying usefulness found within The Quest Master's storage locker and repackaged as your reward!"
tooltip.mce2.occultism.stable_wormhole.f: Unstable! The Wormhole will break when picked up!
tooltip.mce2.ae2.facade.can_be_made_with: Can be made using most blocks
tooltip.mce2.bomd.soul_star: Drops after killing many Undead mobs!
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.generic:
Can be combined with other Accessories to craft Runes
Efficiency Bonus can be re-rolled by crafting Accessories with copies of themselves
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.ad: Crafted from Adventurer Kit, Ancient Scarab and Swimmer Guide
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.an: Crafted from Angler Trophy, Metal Lure and Unbreakable Fishing Line
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.ho: Crafted from Dream Catcher, Discount Voucher and Secret Ingredient
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.mi: Crafted from Miner Guide, Tool Scraps, and Lucky Rock
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.rune.na: Crafted from Certificate of Taming, Idol of Fertility and Tamed Potato Beetle
tooltip.mce2.majruszsaccessories.soul.mi: Crafted from Adventurer Rune, Angler Rune, Household Rune, Miner Rune and Nature Rune
